metadata.title: CVE-2019-20020 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A stack-based buffer over-read was discovered in ReadNextStructField inmat5.c in matio 1.5.17.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20020` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio11 - 1.5.19-2
matio-tools - 1.5.19-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmatio package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.19-2').
